summary: Removes the BLOODY ANNOYING "Yes? What did you need?" line from Serana!
descriptionHtml:
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/192/?]Special Edition version available here![/url][/u]


I was trying to get one armor mod working and happened to be on a dawnguard quest where I had to have Serana with me, and every 2 seconds she kept asking me "Yes? What did you need?"! After nearly breaking my fist and my table and my mouse, I counted to 10 and opened Creation Kit and shut her up for good!

I have since enjoyed this mod so much that I decided to share it with all of you!



So, this mod only removes THAT ONE ANNOYING LINE!!! All other dialog is untouched!
The expanded file also removes the lines "Where'd you come from?" and "Who's there?"

Remember to vote for mod of the month! ;)
And endorse so others will find the peaceful silence as well!

Apparently NOT compatible with Marriable Serana mod! Or so I think, haven't tried that mod myself.
author: Kuunkulta
